infotexts.entitydescription.ampicillin: A fixed-dose combination antibiotic of ampicillin and sulbactam, used to treat various bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentin: A combination antibiotic of amoxicillin and clavulanic acid, used to treat various bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.vancomycin: A glycopeptide antibiotic primarily used to treat various gram-positive bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.gentamicin: An aminoglycoside antibiotic primarily used to treat various gram-negative bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.cotrim: A fixed-dose combination antibiotic of trimethoprim and sulfamethoxazole, used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.imipenem: A combination antibiotic of imipenem and cilastatin, used against a wide variety of bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.ceftazidime: A third-generation cephalosporin antibiotic used against most gram-negative bacteria.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pusyellow: A yellowish-white pus oozes from the wound.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pusgreen: A greenish, foul-smelling pus oozes from the wound.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.abscess: A large pocket of pus accumulates under the skin.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.necfasc: The skin shows deep discoloration and the soft tissue is dying.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cellulitis: The area of skin is red and painful.
infotexts.entitydescription.cultureanalyzingtermin: A machine that examines the biochemical signature of samples to identify pathogens.
infotexts.cultureanalyzer.info: Insert a full-grown culture or viral sample to analyze the type.
infotexts.entitydescription.culturetube: A tube of rich growth medium that bacterial colonies will grow in.
infotexts.entitydescription.cultureanalyzer: Collects bodily samples to allow for analysis.
infotexts.entitydescription.streptubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.streptube: A culture tube with a streptococcus strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.staphtubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.staphtube: A culture tube with a staphyloccocus strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.pseudotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.pseudotube: A culture tube with a pseudomonas sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.provotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.provotube: A culture tube with a provobacter sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.aerotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.aerotube: A culture tube with a aeroganella sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.mrsatubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.mrsatube: A culture tube with an MRSA sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.emptytubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
infotexts.entitydescription.viralmedium: A medium for collecting a viral sample to be analyzed via PCR.
infotexts.entitydescription.emptyviralunk: A viral sample with an unknown strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.coldviralunk: A viral sample with an unknown strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.coldviralmedium: A viral sample with a cold strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.fluviralunk: A viral sample with an unknown strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.fluviralmedium: A viral sample with an influenza strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.europanviralunk: A viral sample with an unknown strain.
infotexts.entitydescription.europanviralmedium: A viral sample with a Iovipneumoviridae strain.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.afstrepvac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against streptococcal infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.strepvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against streptococcus strains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.afstaphvac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against staphylococcal infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.staphvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against staphylococcal strains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.afpseudovac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against pseudomonas infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.pseudovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against pseudomonas strains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.afprovovac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against provobacter infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.provovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against provobacter strains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.afaerovac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against aeroganella infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.aerovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against aeroganella strains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.affluvac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against influenza infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.fluvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against influenza strains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.afeuropanvac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against the Europan cough.
infotexts.entitydescription.europanvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against the Europan cough.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponstrep: A syringe filled with a strain of streptococcus with the purpose of infecting a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponstaph: A syringe filled with a strain of staphylococcus with the purpose of infecting a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponpseudo: A syringe filled with a strain of pseudomonas with the purpose of infecting a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponprovo: A syringe filled with a strain of provobacter with the purpose of infecting a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponaero: A syringe filled with a strain of aeroganella with the purpose of infecting a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponmrsa: A syringe filled with a strain of MRSA with the purpose of infecting a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.dextromethorphan: An antitussive solution used to relieve a cough.
infotexts.entitydescription.remdesivir: A broad-spectrum antiviral drug, commonly used to treat cases of Europan cough.
infotexts.entitydescription.zincsupplement: A supplement for zinc. May be useful for a cold or the flu.
infotexts.entitydescription.hydrocortisone: A corticosteroid used to reduce inflammation by suppressing the immune system.
